chatGptLabel: Healines and Descriptions for Google Ads
promptPrefix:
The text should be in the following language [TARGETLANGUAGE]

[PROMPT]
I want you to use all your background about best practices for ad copywriting and act as an expert to create the best headlines and descriptions for a Google Ads Campaign. Consider this information to build each headline and description: The campaign's main keyword is [KEYWORD], the goal of the campaign is [CAMPAIGNGOAL], the campaign is made for this specific audience [AUDIENCE]

Make sure all the headlines and descriptions are plagiarism free. Use a language that connects and resonate with the specific audience.

Consider the given characteristics of the specific audience as insights to understand their pain-points and present a solution throughout the headlines and descriptions. 

Give me thirty headlines. They should be 30 characters maximum. Present them in a sheet format with the title HEADLINES (Max 30 Characters)

Give me thirty descriptions. The descriptions should be 90 characters maximum. Present them in a sheet format with the title DESCRIPTIONS (Max 90 Characters)
title: Healines and Descriptions for Google Ads
